content: c u t e n o g g cute noggin baby hat finished size 3-6 months 13 5 around the inside of the hat unstretched gauge 5 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch needle size 7 16 circular and double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge cast on 72 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist stitches row 1-11 *k1 p1 repeat from * row 12-20 knit row 21 purl row 22-24 knit row 25 purl row 26 knit row 27-32 seed stitch row 33 knit row 34 purl row 35-38 knit after row 38 you should have about 5 of knitting from your cast on edge decrease section row 39 *k2tog k6 repeat from * row 40 *k2tog k5 repeat from * row 41 *k2tog k4 repeat from * row 42 purl all stitches row 43 *p2tog p3 repeat from * row 44 *k2tog k2 repeat from * row 45 *k2tog k1 repeat from * row 46 k2tog around 9 stitches left row 47 *k2tog k1 repeat from * transfer remaining 6 stitches to one double pointed needle stringy tassel using the working yarn and two double pointed needles cast on 10 stitches 16 stitches total bind off 11 repeat cast on 10 bind off 11 until there are six tassel strings cut yarn leaving a 12 tail wrap the tail firmly around the base of the tassels to create the base of the tassel and secure the yarn end weave in all ends enjoy the pattern heather anderson ravelry learnsomethingnew
